description: Creates an ingestion destination, which specifies how an application's ingested data is processed by Amazon Web Services AppFabric and where it's delivered.

parameters.name: appBundleIdentifier
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) of the app bundle to use for the request.

parameters.name: ingestionIdentifier
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) of the ingestion to use for the request.

parameters.name: processingConfiguration
parameters.description: Contains information about how ingested data is processed. auditLog (dict) --- Contains information about an audit log processing configuration. The event schema in which the audit logs need to be formatted. The format in which the audit logs need to be formatted.

nested_params.name: auditLog
nested_params.description: Contains information about an audit log processing configuration.

nested_params.name: schema
nested_params.description: The event schema in which the audit logs need to be formatted.

nested_params.name: format
nested_params.description: The format in which the audit logs need to be formatted.

parameters.name: destinationConfiguration
parameters.description: Contains information about the destination of ingested data. auditLog (dict) --- Contains information about an audit log destination configuration. Contains information about an audit log destination. s3Bucket (dict) --- Contains information about an Amazon S3 bucket. The name of the Amazon S3 bucket. prefix (string) --- The object key to use. firehoseStream (dict) --- Contains information about an Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream. The name of the Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream.

nested_params.name: auditLog
nested_params.description: Contains information about an audit log destination configuration.

nested_params.name: destination
nested_params.description: Contains information about an audit log destination.

nested_params.name: s3Bucket
nested_params.description: Contains information about an Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: bucketName
nested_params.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: firehoseStream
nested_params.description: Contains information about an Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream.

nested_params.name: streamName
nested_params.description: The name of the Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Specifies a unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. This lets you safely retry the request without accidentally performing the same operation a second time. Passing the same value to a later call to an operation requires that you also pass the same value for all other parameters. We recommend that you use a UUID type of value. If you don't provide this value, then Amazon Web Services generates a random one for you. If you retry the operation with the same ClientToken, but with different parameters, the retry fails with an IdempotentParameterMismatch error. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A map of the key-value pairs of the tag or tags to assign to the resource. (dict) --- The key or keys of the key-value pairs for the tag or tags assigned to a resource. Tag key. Tag value.

nested_items.name: ingestionDestination
nested_items.description: Contains information about an ingestion destination.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ingestion destination.

nested_items.name: ingestionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ingestion.

nested_items.name: processingConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains information about how ingested data is processed.

nested_items.name: schema
nested_items.description: The event schema in which the audit logs need to be formatted.

nested_items.name: format
nested_items.description: The format in which the audit logs need to be formatted.

nested_items.name: destinationConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains information about the destination of ingested data.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: Contains information about an audit log destination.

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: firehoseStream
nested_items.description: Contains information about an Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream.

nested_items.name: streamName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The state of the ingestion destination.
Active: The ingestion destination is active and is ready to be used.
Failed: The ingestion destination has failed. If the ingestion destination is in this state, you should verify the ingestion destination configuration and try again.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the current status of the ingestion destination.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the ingestion destination was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the ingestion destination was last updated.
